Enter your vote today!  A new poll has been created for the 
nbwrpg group:

If people don't post enough (I could 
name a few people, but I don't want to 
be moderated again) should the council 
reserve the right to give away their 
chars (this poll is more to modivate 
inactive people than to have this done)? 

  o yes 
  o no 
  o Death to Life, Life to Slaughter, you didn't think you were the only one who read the Everworld series did you 
  o DOWN WITH LN 
  o What did those last 2 choices have to do with the poll? 


To vote, please visit the following web page:

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/nbwrpg/polls 

Note: Please do not reply to this message. Poll votes are 
not collected via email. To vote, you must go to the Yahoo! Groups 
web site listed above.

Thanks!
